rows: box_line1 {colspan=6, rowspan=4, zIndex=-1, vpad=-10, hpad=-15} | row: {height=15}

query.pigql: a= load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";a = filter a by 'Owner.Role.ParentRoleId' in {{ results(Id_1, 'UserRoleId') }} ; a = group a by 'Owner.Name';a = foreach a generate 'Owner.Name' as 'Owner.Name',  first('Owner.Name') as 'Direct Reports';

a = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; a = filter a by 'Account.Name' in {{ selection(Opportunity_Account_Name_24) }};a = filter a by 'AccountId' in {{ selection(Opportunity_AccountId_47) }}; a = filter a by 'Owner.Name' in {{ selection(step_Display_Report) }}; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true";b = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; b = filter b by 'Owner.Name' in {{ selection(step_Display_Report) }};b = filter b by 'Account.Name' in {{ selection(Opportunity_Account_Name_24) }};b = filter b by 'AccountId' in {{ selection(Opportunity_AccountId_47) }}; b = filter b by 'IsClosed' in ["true"]; c = group a by all, b by all;c = foreach c generate (sum(a['${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}']) / sum(b['${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}'])) as 'avg_win_rate';

a = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";a = filter a by 'Account.Name' in {{ selection(Opportunity_Account_Name_24) }};a = filter a by 'AccountId' in {{ selection(Opportunity_AccountId_47) }};a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == "true";a = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true";a= filter a by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(step_Display_Report) }};a = foreach a generate first('Owner.Username') as 'Owner.Username', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch') as 'Days_Open'; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate avg('Days_Open') as 'avg_Days_Open';a = order a by 'avg_Days_Open' asc;
